website_summaries.verdict: Durable, pet friendly and easy to clean. Keeps your RV looking fantastic, inside and out. Dresses up the outside; keeps dirt from entering the inside.
pros: Stands up to dog claws without snagging
UV coated to protect against fading and other sun damage
cons: Dirt can work its way through the weave
Melts easily, so keep away from fires and burning embers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rug for camping
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug! Bought it for our camper and love how easy it is to sweep, wipe off or hose down to clean. Very light weight but yet durable. Would definatley buy again? Love the size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding up in all weather
customer_reviews.text: The mat is perfect for our 30 ft trailer. Beautiful design looks great holding up good too we have been camping for almost 4 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed......
customer_reviews.text: Loved the rug when it came! Went camping and the rug is splitting and separating. This will not last more that one season if that. Very poor quality. UPDATE!!!!! WOW...Company has GREAT customer service. They reached out to me and gave me a couple of options to work with regarding the mat. Would recommend highly ordering from this company knowing that if you have ANY issues they are willing and able to take care of them for you. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. My husband thought I was crazy for ordering such a large size but it didn’t take long to win him over. Much more enjoyable to walk on the mat versus dirt. Pretty much covered our entire campsite. Poured down rain and we were able to sweep off the side lying down. Going to get another smaller size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hooper

customer_reviews.title: ... our old popup at Camping World but smaller and LOVED it. We purchased a new traveling trailer and ...
customer_reviews.text: We previously had purchased this same kind of mat for our old popup at Camping World but smaller and LOVED it. We purchased a new traveling trailer and purchased this mat since it matched perfect in color and size. We did not open the mat until our first camping trip (3wks after receiving order). We were happy with the size but HIGHLY disappointed in the quality of the mat. When opened from the package we realized there was a small area where the threading was already coming apart creating a hole. We are going to try and repair it ourselves but would not purchase from this kind of product from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Its lightweight which is awesome but it isn't indestructible. Works great for what we need it for and stores nice under the camper. Everyone seems to comment that they like it. Chair legs will be the downfall of the durability. Seems like they push and pull too hard on the rug if not careful. Some negative reviews are forgetting the convience vs durability. I'd gladly buy another if needed next season than deal with big roll of carpet crammed in the storage compartment.
customer_reviews.author: trev_151

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a very nice mat. However
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a very nice mat.However, theAmazon warehouse orderI received was damaged and had a cut in it. It will cost me too much to return. The QA of the warehouse items needs to be much better. I spend a small fortune with Amazon...I deserve better :(
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Burke

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you are getting the Best Price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item on May 9, 2017 from Amazon for $33.51 with our Prime. Make sure you use camel camel camel to check on Amazon pricing to see that you are getting the best price. We love this item and it worked great last year camping. We hope to have another great year using this with our camper this season. I'm even more happy with it when I see the price it currently is at today 5/2/2018 for $69.95. The site camel camel camel has saved me lots of money along with the honey extension.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Loving this rug!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this rug in the yard now for a month and it still looks like new. Rain does not effect it and it's so easy to just sweep off with a broom. I have put coasters under my umbrella table feet and swing so as not to puncture it. I thought my outside cats would really tear it up but none of them have even scratched it. Feels soft under bare feet also. I purchased the lighter color so I could see the creepy crawlies but I haven't seen any of them on this rug either. Really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: these look awesome poolside
customer_reviews.text: Love these mats - not just for camping - purchased three and placed them poolside! They look better than expected and arrived in perfect shape. They are comfy to walk on and attractive. All my neighbors are asking what they are and where I got them! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb P.

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean just hosed it off and let it ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time with our camper. It happened to rain while we camping and this kept a lot of mud and debris out of the camper. easy to clean just hosed it off and let it dry. Easy to store and has a bag to store it in. I don't use that. Just be careful not to get it caught on anything it feels like it could stretch or rip easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this mat. I was glad to find one long enough to stretch between both doors of our trailer. The pattern and colors are a great combination. My one concern is the durability. This is our first time using it and we can see that rocks and uneven ground might cause a tear. Our last mat is 4 years old and in good condition. I purchased this one for color and length. I hope we get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: kim braun

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought this.
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice for camping. Gives you a clean area outside the motorhome to walk barefoot and not track in dirt. Dries quickly. It’s made from woven plastic tubes and so far has held up. I thought it would be thicker though. We make sure to do a lot of rock clearing before we lay it down because you can easily feel pointed rocks through this and I also fear the rocks will damage it. We bought the largest one and I’m glad we did. Covers a large area along the side of the motorhome. Nice design too. Very light weight. Only weighs 11 lbs and folds up nicely for travel. Carry case included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain
customer_reviews.text: We use the mat in front of our trailer when we camp. It helps keep the dirt and debris out of the trailer not to mention it gives the dog a place to lay that isn’t in the dirt. It is light weight enough to shake out before putting it away. This mat is well made and the carrying case is a nice touch although it is rather flimsy and probably won’t last long. I’ve paid twice as much for mats that aren’t this well made or as large. The bonus is it matches our trailer colors.
customer_reviews.author: ML Hruby

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, folds easy, and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Got my first set from camping world, this set appears to be the same quality as that set. They don't take items with a concentrated placement, like the legs on a folding chair will leave ring impressions in the vinyl. They do dry very quickly, fold easily and don't weigh much. This is my fourth order and lay them end to end full length of our RV, handles rain very well, does have to have additional stakes as wind moves it very easily. They will also melt pretty easy, so have to keep away from fires and burning embers. A little common sense and these will last quite awhile. Our first set is 3 years old and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great rug, and great price!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is really large, looks great and is exactly what i wanted. We have a smaller camper so it covers the area under our awning completely. The issue Ive noticed is that when it gets wet, it is a bit slippery. It’s made out of something that feels more like a plastic so can be washed with a hose if it gets dirty. Colors and design advertised are what you get! Also it folds up nicely after each use and fits easily back into it’s carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Elsen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, must have, camping accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! Did I say love? We used this for the first time on a super, rainy, gross weekend. This was nice to keep from bringing all the mud inside of our trailer. We paired this mat with $20 stakes and everything was great. Only thing I would recommend is more tabs for the stakes. It only has 4. 6 or 8 would be more appropriate for a rug of this size. It dries nicely and the storage bag is a must as well! Would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Latham

customer_reviews.title: It is HUGEe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a giant hot mess for what I wanted it for. I have a trampoline in my backyard and wanted to use this for when the kids approach the trampoline (instead of walking on rocks and dirt). However, we have had windy days and this thing is huge and blows all over the back yard. Even when I try and hold down with heavy rocks in each corner. I haven't even tried to refold it, it's crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Niecy

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Easy to Clean - Easy to Store!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the money. Cleans off easily and folds up nicely. It's woven plastic.....it's not gonna last forever. For $60 if these things last a season or two I think they are well worth the money. The people who are complaining have unrealistic expectations in my opinion. I also didn't completely rely on stakes to hold it down since it gets windy in Northern California. I put my table on it, chairs, and coolers. The chairs didn't wear any holes or anything, and neither did the table.
customer_reviews.author: richard plecenik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to turn an urban concrete outdoor area into a cozy sitting area.
customer_reviews.author: NittanyPanda

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use our new camping mat this past week. I loved the size and the fact that it was super lightweight and easy to use but after the first days use it already had a hole in it and it looks like a tear of some sort. All we had was camping chairs on it that were rockers. I was very disappointed to see this and I’m worried I just threw $70 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Great for our travel trailer camping -- EASY TO SWEEP AND KEEP CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: If you dread dirt being tracked into your RV, this is a great product as it allows for a buffer-zone between your RV and a typical dirt campsite. It really makes for a nice patio-of-sorts; we'll put our chairs on it and light the propane campfire for a great evening under the awning. I'd buy this over and over again; we've used ours a dozen times and while showing a bit of age, it's easy to clean (sweep at camp, hose off when at home) and should last us quite a few more trips.
customer_reviews.author: glasdriver

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money. We used this to cover our wooden deck in our backyard. I used 4 screws with washers on each end of rug to keep it in place. It lasted all swim season and I'll be purchasing another one next season. It stood up well in a high traffic area, under the feet of chairs a well as a large dog walking on it.
customer_reviews.author: Not You

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase and would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful! My girls wanted to be able to lay out but our wood deck was uninviting. This works perfect and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great size, dries fast, kept sand under the mat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and size! We used this mat for the first time on a beach camping trip. It kept the sand to a minimum. It was easy to clean up with a little electric blower daily and when folding it back for storage. It dried fast too. The bag is big enough that you don’t have to force the mat back in when you are finished. We loved the size and the color worked perfectly with our rig.
customer_reviews.author: DCW

customer_reviews.title: Already compromised weaving and carry bag damage on arrival!
customer_reviews.text: Just opened today to put in our camper unfolded it to check has some loose as in not attached weaving not sure it’s gonna stand up to camping and foot traffic, then took out carrying bag which had a slit in the middle of bag which is about 2/3 length of bag, thinking I should just return the price for this kind of workmanship is not warranted! Very unhappy and haven’t even used it, but if it’s already apart in a couple places I imagine it will not hold up!
customer_reviews.author: #1Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sight-unseen after reading the reviews online. The idea was to replace/upgrade from a standard blue tarp in front of our 19' travel trailer. This is the perfect size, with the trailer awning covering almost the entire mat. I like the semi-open weave, as it is sure to drain water and fine sand...the bane of camping in Texas. The pattern also complements the Jayco graphics on our trailer. We'll see how it stands up to the Texas sun, but if we get a few seasons out of it, it will have paid for itself versus the old tarp.
customer_reviews.author: BGD

customer_reviews.title: Dogs toenail went through it the first day.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great price but the dogs toenail snagged in the weave on the first day. Not sure if there was a defect because it hasn't happened since and the dogs walk all over it. I think there may have been a small flaw and a piece of the plastic weave came loose. Ive had it a few weeks and it is on a cement covered patio. I just blow off the dust with my leaf blower.
customer_reviews.author: es

customer_reviews.title: Really nice mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat looks great and is big enough for our "patio" area. It actually feels good on your feet too which I was surprised by. Easy to clean off and handle. Only gave 4 stars because the first time we used it, we tried it out on grass, when we put a chair on it the chair went through the mat. A cap had come off the chair leg. Don't know if it was because it was on grass or because of the cap not being there. No problems since then and have used on gravel and pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Alford

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, this is a nice looking mat, but the material it is made with is soft and not very sturdy, so lawn chairs make marks in it even when no one sits in them. I don't think it will last as long as my first mat lasted, but then I didn't pay as much as I did for my first mat either. It is easy to sweep and hose off, so it cleans up great. But like I said, I have my doubts as to it's durability.
customer_reviews.author: mirage790

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rug
customer_reviews.text: We have this rug on our lower deck for our granddaughter to play on. We put a sprinkler on it so she can run through & the rug is holding up great. It doesn't get slick either. Also, I can sweep any leaves off very quickly. I would love to have more of these rugs for the upstairs deck. Next spring I will be looking to Amazon to have them again!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Dan

customer_reviews.title: There is no bag.
customer_reviews.text: The product says that there will be a bag to store the mat in. There isn't one. I'm not happy with it not being in the box. The storage bag is one of the main reasons I purchased this. I liked the idea of keeping it organized. Now it flops around and opens as I try to put it in my top level of my storage unit. The mat is fine and what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and does not cost much but after one weekend of camping. It has already shown worn spots and a few small tears. I do not recommend this if you have a dog or if you wear shoes/sandals on this. We will probably need to get a new one in two years. Very affordable but cheap construction. With us going camping 9 weekends throughout the summer and a big trip for one full week. This is not for us. Price is good for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lachapell

customer_reviews.title: Makes camping life easier!
customer_reviews.text: We had absolutely no issues with our new mat and liked the way it looked with our toy hauler. We put it to the test rearranging chairs, the grill, pet supplies and more during a hot, humid, stormy weekend. We were amazed that the dirt and debris stayed outside, even during the storms! Clean-up was a breeze, opening it out in the sun to dry at home and giving it a quick sweep before folding it back up. If it hadn’t been wet from the rain, we could have simply swept it off and returned it to its storage bag when we broke camp. We’re looking forward to our next adventure!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for a hot patio.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother for Mother’s Day. She was looking for something to put over her patio so it wouldn’t be too hot to walk on. She lives in Arizona where the temperature is often over 100° and her patio stones get too hot to walk on for her and her puppy. She loves this! She says it is easy to clean and of good quality. It was easy to lay down and looks nice. Her puppy is now able to enjoy being outside in the summer without burning his little paws.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Tremain

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to give five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and everything about it. BUT when it arrived and we opened the box, carefully laid it out, we see that it already had 6 snags that were completely loose from the weave. We planned a trip across the US in late September in our new rv with this mat. But sadly we feel the mat won't hold up with any use due to the snags. Anything on or close to the snags may cause more damage. We're taking it and keeping our fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: SandyP

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. It is light weight and is pre-folded into a compact rectangle that is easy to stash in the RV. The material is woven strands of plastic so you don't have to worry about it getting wet or mold. The strands will actually separate enough to put a stake through without damaging the product. The design matches our RV so that is just an added bonus! It is light enough that I put tent stakes in the corners to make sure the wind didn't lift it up. Actually, I put the BBQ on one corner and a potted plan on the other and then staked the remaining two.
customer_reviews.author: RVH

customer_reviews.title: Storage bag was NOT included
customer_reviews.text: There was no storage bag included. The mat seems nice but storing will not be as simple as putting in the bag shown as it was not included in the box I received. No bag no stars
customer_reviews.author: John Ado

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to our campsite and camper. It easy to clean and store. Usually with items this big they NEVER fit in the storage that comes with it, but this proved me wrong. It folds easily and the storage bag is a great size to keep using. Our dog has already picked a few of the loops out, so if you have pets that like to play beware. Pleasantly surprised by this purchase. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.text: This mat looks great, we got some compliments our first time out. It is not as durable as I’d hoped. There are already some small tears from nothing more than our camp chair legs. On the plus side, the tears don’t seem to tear further, the damage appears to be confined to the contact areas only. Nice product, but I don’t think I’ll spend this much on the next one, given that the life expectancy IMO isn’t long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Priebe

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you are an avid camper like we are. We normally go off grid (dirt/etc) and don't spend our weekends at RV resorts etc, except on a limited basis. I bought this on a whim as we had indoor outdoor carpet and have tried others in the past. But this is amazing. Even after a rain, you simply sweep it off and fold it up and its ready to go. Doesn't stay either. Keeps the camper cleaner and looks great. The only problem I have with it is that I cant get it back in the storage bag, but I'm not worried about that it fits fine in the storage dept in our 5th wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Tera A.

customer_reviews.title: The material should be made more durable, doesn’t stay pretty long.
customer_reviews.text: We placed 2 zero gravity chairs and a folding picnic table on this rug and when we packed up to go home after 2 nights, the rug was ruined in those areas. The rug is very pretty when you first put it down, but it is not made of durable product, poor quality for actual outdoor camping.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents after my dog tangled his leash around their grill and sent hot coals flying which landed on their original rug just like this, burning huge holes in it. We inherited the holey rug lol. That being said, it's really nice that it cleans so easily, sweeping, hosing off, etc is a breeze. But it is a plastic type material and melts like butter, so make sure you keep anything hot away from it :-/
customer_reviews.author: Krista B.

customer_reviews.title: it feels good under our feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for our basement after we had to rip up carpet. First off, it is massive. Second, it feels good under our feet. Third, it has held with all of our kids and critters on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great recycle story
customer_reviews.text: I bought one too big for our van so I gave it to a neighbor who had a large motorhome. They decided to sell their big one after about a year. By that time we were ready to buy a bigger unit and they offered us the rug back. After several months in the Florida sun, it was returned to us looking brand new. Our favorite part is that the rain goes straight through, drying both rug and ground very fast. We've had others that trapped the water, so this thing is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: TN MT Mama

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean and looks great. I ordered the 9X18 and am very pleased so far. I don't expect it to endure a lot of abuse since it is basically woven plastic but I would have gotten a regular type outdoor carpet if I thought we would be rough on it. I really like it and it's comfortable to walk barefoot on!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, falling apart already!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat one month ago and the white colored material is already flaking and coming apart! I fully understand this isn't a high end outdoor mat, but I expected it would make it longer than this before starting deteriorating.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl  Dycus

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly. It's very pretty. Not heavy, compares with those you purchase at Camping World. Will need to be anchored. We purchased the anchor kit with the rug. Don't know how long it will last. But I'm pleased and will use it with pride. It looks beautiful with our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great mat option for our RV patio.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first large awning mat I've seen that would look nice with our camper. The colors and pattern match our trim nicely. We wanted a mat to extend more closely the length and width of our camper and canopy and this one works well. We've had so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Great Tailgating Mat
customer_reviews.text: Got this mat for tailgating in New Orleans, and it's great, only used it once but had plenty foot traffic and kids playing one it and I washed it with the hose and folded it ad put it back inn the carrying bag!! That's the Big Plus the Carrying Bag!! A+++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Danny Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Second time using this rug and it already has a huge hole in it. Not sure where the hole came from. The size is perfect and it folds super easy but durability is not up to par for what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Turner

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat
customer_reviews.text: We love this, especially camping in the desert! Just take a broom and sweep it off and your done. The amount of dirt that ends up in my trailer is down by half because of this mat. I would not recommend putting a heavy table on this though. The feet will punch a hole through it
customer_reviews.author: Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the mat. It matches my camper perfectly. The problem is that straight out of the package, at least 3 areas were messed up. It's not terrible, but for being brand new, I expect better. I didn't want to return it as I wanted it for my Camping trip. I hope that it holds up for many trips, but I don't know. It is beautiful though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and they're just perfect for outdoors use. Sand and dirt comes right off, can be hosed off, maintains shape, folds back up the way it came, and it's super light weight for how big it is. Opposite color scheme on flip side, either looks great. Keeps the dirt and sand and crud out of the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mat to use with our camper. It is so nice. The last 2 places we have camped have a bunch of stickers. The stickers didn't stick to this mat so we could just sweep them off. When it is time to pack up you just sweep the mat off and fold it up and put it in its bag. It keeps us from tracking dirt and junk into the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Decent mat...good price/value.
customer_reviews.text: Nice patio mat of the typical woven polypropylene construction. The short ends are bound with nylon webbing but the long edges are not. The carrying bag is a joke. Paper thin nylon with a drawstring closure and a short webbing handle. My old mat came with a cordura nylon bag with a zippered end and a generous zippered side pouch for storing the stakes...the new mat fits inside perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Damaged and doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this mat! Upon unfolding it I saw so many spots that were damaged 😭 3 stars due to this but not 1 Star because I do like how big it is. I have a camping trip coming up in 4 days so I won’t be returning it due to not being able to wait for a new one to come in. Uhg. Back to edit from three stars to one. Had this out for one night and we woke up the morning to find this huge hole in it. From now on I will be buying something that’s more durable rather than something I think looks cool 😭
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Lots of passerby’s ask where they can get one. The size is perfect for our 42’ MotorHome.
customer_reviews.text: These are carpets are a decent quality. Not indestructible by any means. They are good for two seasons. If you’re in a muddy campground don’t expect this mat to survive. The white color will stain. This is not a dig on this carpet, they all have the same problem. They are very good for concrete pads and gravel sites.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Really love this rug! Perfect for outside the trailer. As for cleaning we blow it off with a leaf blower or spray it with a hose and it’s good as new. I can say much for durability yet. I’ve only had it a few months. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Porsc2008

customer_reviews.title: Perfect RV camping mat
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight considering the size. Provides a nice cushy porch off our RV. Keeps the dust down and protects our dogs paws from hot asphalt. Really simple to clean. Dry dirt falls off with a shake, if it gets muddy, just hose it off and leave it in the sun for 20 minutes. Easy to fold under to adjust for different sized sites.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Missing Carrying Bag
customer_reviews.text: Received the mat today with much excitement as we were hoping to get it before our big camping trip for this upcoming holiday. We received the mat and it looks and feels great. Unfortunately, there is no carrying bag with it despite being advertised that it comes with a free carrying bag. This was an important feature for us since the mat is so large. We will be contacting customer service and hopefully the issue will be resolved but are disappointed that we cannot utilize the mat for our upcoming trip now since it'll most likely have to go through the entire return process to get the correct item that we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Make sure everything that is advertised is received..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year and put it away for the 2019 camping season. Opened it up and found the "included" storage bag had indeed not been included. Lesson learned...ALWAYS check out the product when it arrives. Now to find a storage bag that will fit....ugh.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: product is exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: we waited one year to buy a mat for our awning area of our camper. why did we wait? this product is exactly as advertised. light weight, great construction, reversible, easily stores away in the carrying case that is included. the price was fantastic and arrived fast. the colors are exactly as the picture show. what else can be said. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tom F.

customer_reviews.title: Great cost efficient alternative to a rug for a porch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our screened in back porch. Definitely a great option to very expensive 9 x 12 outdoor rugs. I did tack it down w some screws but bought some good sized rubber washers to hold it down. Makes it easier to sweep/clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Picked it up on Amazon on sale for $49. Have used it a few times camping. Sand falls thorough and it's easy to sweep off. It's cumbersome to fold & put away but worth it. Lightweight and will blow away if not secured. We have had no issues so far with rips or tears.
customer_reviews.author: Winjimir

customer_reviews.title: great for our mx family
customer_reviews.text: Went on our first trip with this, let me tell you we put it through the ringer. I had dirt bikes driving over it. Camp chairs on it! And it did great. With how rough we are i cant see it lasting a whole season but for the price and how easy it is to hose down, man do i love it. The weave is not as tight as the "high end" 250 bucks brands, but it was a great size. And honestly i would rather buy this and replace every year or two then spend 250 on something i may have to do the same thing with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for our purposes.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not heavy duty, but for the price it suits our purpose. The bag is VERY flimsy. Don’t count on using it for long. Ours rippedcarrying it from the house out to the camper! If you are looking for a sturdy patio mat that will last for years with daily use, this probably isn’t it. However, if you want a large and inexpensive mat to take camping several weekends a year, I think it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lake2lake

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this mat shortly after we bought our camper. We have only used it on one camping trip so far. It helped to keep the dirt from being carried in to the camper. Nice color. I can’t attest to its durability as we have only used it once.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Grab this
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to our Motorhome. Seriously all you do it pick up the rug and sand and dirt just slides off. Easy to fold and store back in the bag. Great colors and design. Recommend something like little bags of sand to keep the sides down if it gets windy.
customer_reviews.author: CooCoo

customer_reviews.title: It's All Good, Nothing Negative to Share
customer_reviews.text: Very large but it folds up easily and requires less storage space than our previous matt that was 30% smaller. It looks good and feels good to your bare feet. Nothing negative to say.
customer_reviews.author: Charles1951

customer_reviews.title: Durable mat.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mat, very durable. The only reason I am not giving it a five star is the edging has come off a little on the side. Otherwise we have really enjoyed this mat. The color is very vibrant and I really like the fact that it is reversible if you want a little different look.
customer_reviews.author: BestsontheroadTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of this type of mat. I have different sizes for different purposes. They are great for camping or even if you want to use them under a pop-up on your back patio. They are lightweight, fold easily and compact, they are easy to clean, and reversible. Also you cannot beat Amazon's price. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: smora234

customer_reviews.title: easy to sweep off.  when wet died fast.
customer_reviews.text: Used once so far. It rained day we left.' Next day took it out to dry and that was quick. One concern our site had a concrete pad and mat larger than pad I noticed some stretch spots on the overhang area that I am hoping will work out once its flat again. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: the picture shows a storage bag mine did not come with one
customer_reviews.author: Kerry L. Gaston

customer_reviews.title: which has been nice to contain the dirt the rug collects at camp ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid, I can't complain one bit about this! It's identical in material as I can pick up at the local RV dealership but cost half as much. It's a lightweight, plastic, straw-like material. Makes it ideal for camping or at home for using to crawl under vehicles. This particular mat also came with a carrying case, which has been nice to contain the dirt the rug collects at camp sites. It's been holding up well to sun exposure and traffic, though our German Shepherd did poke some holes in it when she stretched on the rug and dug her nails in it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hadden

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Had it out for about an hour in a local state park. Pulled a lounge chair over it and it snagged a hole in it. Picked it up to leave and found 2 other holes in it from the gravel it was sitting on. How have 3 holes the size of a quarter in it. Very disappointing. Last turf style rug lasted 8+ years and was still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: scott h

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I read online how some items ship and come incomplete or look like it was previously opened and returned. The case is the same here, the packaging was all torn up and the label said it was way smaller than what we ordered. However, once opened the product was exactly what we had ordered and it was in NEW condition. The product itself, although we haven't had it long we have done some "bad" things to it (put stuff on it that should have damaged it) and it withstood the abuse and still looks great. Great value, great quality. Overall for us, "Don't judge a book by it's cover" certainly applies.
customer_reviews.author: grdjones

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much, got another in a different color!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one of these several years ago, in different shades of colors to match the Class A that we had then. After we traded it in last fall and got a new motorhome, we needed one with a different color scheme to match our new rig. We love that these mats fold nicely and are lightweight. They're easy to sweep, or hose off and dry quickly. They are also soft enough to walk around barefoot on, even if it's staked down over gravel. The only downside would be...campfire embers that sometimes waift through the air and land on it, leave little burn holes (like cigarette burns).
customer_reviews.author: Sandal Tan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time to find an outdoor mat that I liked. This has a great design and was larger than most that I could find. We get compliments from everyone who comes to the house. Very easy to clean, comfortable on bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: matilda

customer_reviews.title: not at all as described
customer_reviews.text: product is listed as black and white. picture clearly shows mat being black/white and gray. after opening and inspecting mat, found mat black/gray, with no white at all. does not look like picture at all. completely unhappy with color of product. if i wanted black/gray i would of ordered that. only good thing was quick shipping. cust. support is offered for all the other products i have ever ordered but this product does not offer that.
customer_reviews.author: ben emilyta

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. Looked around for a reasonably priced rug in a bigger size. It looks just like the picture and feels good under your bare feet. It is easy to clean and holds up well. We've been using it all summer long. It also dries quickly. Would definitely purchase again. Matches our trailer perfectly and we get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Best product for you camping needs
customer_reviews.text: 16 month review. Absolutely awesome. We bought 2 so we can span most of the trailer length. The bag is not like a sleeping bag where you can’t reuse them. The bag has ample room for folding back up. It keeps a good barrier from the ground to the surface. It is a nylon type material so camp fire sparks will blow a hole in them. Haha. Speaking from experience. Quality product and nice design. 4 corners have tent peg loops to secure your Matt. Well made loops. At the moment going on about 10 trips with the Matt in dusty, dirt environment. Still holds up great. Hose it down dry it out looks like new
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this before a 4 day camping trip and don’t know how we lived without it!!!!!! So much less tracking in & out of the camper! And when we packed up, it swept off and folded perfectly into the bag for the next use! It did come with a few pulls in it and we hope they don’t catch on anything and cause problems in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Fairbrother

customer_reviews.title: best outdoor mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our camper and we just love it! the material is great. it's mesh so the rain goes through and dries the mat and the ground underneath quickly. It also looks fantastic. this is definitely the best outdoor rug I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Robin MacDonell

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a nice carry drawstring bag. The design is really cool and matches Alpha Wolf or Bullet perfectly! Easy to clean with a leaf blower or hose off at the end of the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Rob T

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mat that matches the graphics on our RV. Decent quality and very easy to clean, just hang it on a fence and hose it off, allow to dry for an hour or so, and fold it up. Comes with a nice carrying bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We've gone camping with our pop-up several times now. The mat keeps much of the dirt and leaves out of the camper. We sweep it clean...pack it up...put it back in its bag and done. Very heavy mat...Should be very durable. UPDATE: We used the mat multiple times and even on one rainy campout this fall. There are a couple of small burn holes from my son-in-law cigarette ashes...but no unraveling. It has held up and cleaned up each time remarkably well. I was going to be happy to get one season, but this mat is going to last for years. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Khaki Stich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat to use under my gazebo on my deck and I couldn't be happier! It's not only beautiful, but made so if water (rain) gets on it, it goes right through. It adds such a glamorous (for lack of a better word) touch to my entire deck and I've gotten tons of compliments. LOVE IT and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Thin, no case, but good size
customer_reviews.text: I like the length and the wits of this it takes up the entire front of our trailer which is great. It is a little thin so you have to be careful where you put it and if you put chairs on it that have pointy legs. Also in the pictures and the description it says it comes with a carrying case it did not come with a carrying case very disappointed about that
customer_reviews.author: ECRESPO73

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: We bought our first reversible mat elsewhere, then bought this one through Amazon because it was the bigger size. This May is cheap and already falling apart. We had to put duct tape on it because the seams are disintegrating. It might last the season but I will not buy this product again. The first one we bought was far better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Steele

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! Better than I expected. Large enough to be under both our camper doors. Mat is a plastic fabric instead of cotton which I prefer more as it is easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lesli

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and when I used it it went down with no problems. I've had other mats that won't lay flat. This one rolls back up fine and it's easy to clean with just a broom. It's very sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: I had it out last Father's Day when all the kids and grandkids came and had the camper up so the kids could play in it and the p
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth every penny I paid for this rug. I had it out last Father's Day when all the kids and grandkids came and had the camper up so the kids could play in it and the parents sat out with the toddlers on the rug and thought it was the best thing in the world. now just went out last weekend for camping with the kids again and they were so grateful not to have to sit in the mud after it rained everything goes right through and dries up quickly! So far 1 1/2 seasons in MN with this mat and still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Dina D

customer_reviews.title: Nice patio carpet
customer_reviews.text: Second mat purchased in 5 yrs. It is left it on patio year round usually and swept off when wet or snowed on. Washes easily with hose and keeps little feet cool in summer on concrete patio.
customer_reviews.author: gramma130

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good.
customer_reviews.text: Comically easy to clean off dried mud. Literally, broom it away. Super easy to unpack and repack for two people. It’s only been used twice, hence the hesitation toniffer 5 stars to durability nor sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our motorcoach.
customer_reviews.text: Folds up easily and stores in the nice bag provided. Cleans easily and creates a great barrier for the dirt in the campsite so we don't track into the coach.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: Love the mat and recieved lots of compliments! It is very easy to clean and helped keep the dirt out of our camper. Unfortunately, we didn't realize that put it over a chipmunk hole, and he chewed a hole in one corner.
customer_reviews.author: Nortman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty rug but thin.
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and design of this product, however it it really thin. I was hoping it was a sturdier product. I kept it because it matches our RV but I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly LaPorte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for in front of the RV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in front of my RV while camping. Not only does it look great, it keeps a lot of the dirt and debris from making it inside. This seller was fantastic too! There was an issue with my initial order and they jumped right on it and fixed it immediately. .
customer_reviews.author: MsBee

customer_reviews.title: actually matched the detailing of the camper
customer_reviews.text: it is huge. finally a outdoor rug for camping with plenty of room for everything and everyone. the price was incredible. i bought it for my sister and her husband and they love it. they are using it now. it actually matches the detailing on their fifth wheel. thumbs up and a big ten stars. thank you for such a great value. i also bought a smaller one for my back porch and i love it. so durable and easy to keep clean. thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: vickie seal

product_meta.title: REVERSIBLE MATS 159183 Blue/Grey 9-Feet x 18-Feet RV Patio Mat
product_meta.description: Size:9x18| Color:Blue w/ GrayThis reversible outdoor mat is designed for home patio or garden, creating your RV outdoor space, afternoons in the park or days at the beach. Sweep clean with a broom or spray clean with water. Woven polypropylene dries quickly to prevent mold and mildew and is coated with UV protection to resist sun damage and fading. Corner loops can be staked to hold it in place. Folds easily for storage in the included carrying bag. Note: Viewing colors on the internet can be difficult. Different monitor and screen settings may not represent exact color hues. We do our best to represent the colors as accurately as possible. UPC: 837654533307
feature_bullets: UV coated to protect against fading and other sun damage
Soft and durable 100% virgin polypropylene material
Easy to clean and mold and mildew resistant—sweep away dirt or spray clean with water
Lightweight and compact, it folds for easy storage into included carrying bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,162 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
